name: Tuna "Rice" Casserole
ingredients: 20 ounces fresh cauliflower, shredded, 1 small head

instructions.en: Put the shredded cauliflower in a 2 1/2 quart casserole with a lid. Cover and microwave on HIGH 8-10 minutes until just tender, stirring every couple minutes. Do not overcook. Stir in 1 tablespoon butter.
Sauté the diced celery in the remaining tablespoon of butter until very tender.
In a medium microwaveable bowl, mix 6 ounces of the cheese and cream. Microwave 2 minutes on HIGH to melt the cheese; stir until well blended.
Whisk in the mayonnaise, seasonings and dry onion to the cheese mixture.
Stir the celery, tuna and mushrooms into the cauliflower; add the cheese sauce and mix well.
Cover and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.
Uncover, top with the remaining cheese and bake another 10-15 minutes until bubbly.

notes: This recipe makes 6-8 servings. The casserole can be frozen. It can be covered and chilled before baking; add an extra 5-10 minutes to first baking time if chilled. Nutritional information is provided for both 1/6 and 1/8 of the recipe.
